/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling intersection in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape. Trees and buildings line the streets, adding layers of depth to the scene. The sun shines brightly, casting shadows and highlighting the city's architectural details. In the foreground, a traffic light stands tall, guiding the flow of vehicles and pedestrians. The image is bathed in natural daylight, enhancing the colors and details of the cityscape.
